channel.title: Picassos on Theias
channel.description: Recent content in Picassos on Theias

item.description: Title: Picasso Data: 2020-01-19 Description: Pablo Ruiz Picasso[a][b] (25 October 1881 â€“ 8 April 1973) was a Spanish painter, sculptor, printmaker, ceramicist and theatre designer who spent most of his adult life in France. Regarded as one of the most influential artists of the 20th century, he is known for co-founding the Cubist movement, the invention of constructed sculpture,[6][7] the co-invention of collage, and for the wide variety of styles that he helped develop and explore.
